jostle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to push or knock against someone in a crowd, especially so that you can get somewhere or do something before other people
jostle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Followers of the president jostled for position in front of the TV cameras.
jostle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to compete for something such as attention or a reward
jostle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: A thousand thoughts were jostling around inside my mind.
